required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Computer Assisted Quality-monitoring for Magnet-controlled Capsule Endoscopy: a Prospective Case-control Study.
clinical_study.official_title: Computer Assisted Quality-monitoring for Magnet-controlled Capsule Endoscopy: a Prospective Case-control Study.

brief_summary.textblock: During the past several years，MCE（magnet controlled endoscopy）has made great process in detecting lesions of gastric as well as screening. Compared with conventional endoscopy, magnetically controlled capsule endoscopy can be further optimized in gastric examination. So we make an AI for operators to help improve the quality of MCE and record the mucosa visibilty of gastirc.

detailed_description.textblock: We developed a new artificial intelligence for quality improving during the operation of magnet controlled endoscopy. The AI can help operators screen every part of gastric and then evaluate the visibilty of gastic. Also, It can be record time of the opration. Other than that ,we compared the performancce of AI with experts.

primary_outcome.measure: The integrity of the magnet controlled capsule endoscopy
primary_outcome.description: The performance of the operator developing the MCE in screen the gastric without omissions
Evaluating the performance of AI to recognize the visibility of gastric mucosa

primary_outcome.measure: The time of operation in gastric
primary_outcome.description: Calculating the time of the magnet controlled capsule endoscapy

intervention.description: AI-box is a system fixed adjacent to magnet controlled capsule endoscopy. Patients who accept the check of magnet controlled capsule endoscopywill be enrolled .

study_pop.textblock: The patients who acccept the magnet controlled capsule endoscopy with the help of "AI-box"will be enrolled.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patients between 18 and75
- patients who can sign informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients who are unsuitable to accept the check

facility.name: Department of Gastroenterology, Qilu Hospital, Shandong University
